title: Screen Design:  "Hiroshima"
medium: Black and color marking pens, brush and blue watercolor; crayon, graphite, collaged photocopies on white tracing paper
description: At center right, four panel screen on wheels of differently shaped and colored panels.  From left to right:  blue panel with stripes of black wave pattern; green panel with black at top and black spots (like debris) falling from it, with clock on upper edge (collaged to paper) reading "8:16;" two red and black panels with wood grain-like pattern, with white triangle drawn at upper right and irregular upper edge/  Two photocopies taped to left of screen:  above, exploding building; below, woman with left hand at mouth and express of horror on face.
name: design
